data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Champhai, Mizoram, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Champhai, Mizoram, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Champhai, Mizoram, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Champhai that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Champhai, Mizoram, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Chakma people.
Spirit, guide the 1,383 believers in the county of Champhai into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Champhai. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary:
the county of Champhai, Mizoram, India has a population of 125,700.

We estimate Champhai has 1,383 people who might know Jesus, 1,525 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 122,792 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Champhai, Mizoram, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
